Have you guys gotten any of these addons to work? I can't get them to install and I have a real version of Realflight. thanks.

Some people are having problems with the drive letter when intstalling.
This can easily be solved be changing the drive letter realflight asks for
in the file C:Program FilesRealFlightfileread.ini 

Change the row:
InstallDir=d:

to the drive letter to what you want to install from

Merlin3

Anyone have a serial for addons 1 & 2? DL'd another torrent of this that didn't have it. Tks.

All you have to do to get it to work is change the drive letter in the c:\program files\realflightg3\fileread.txt to your hard drive  (normally C:)

The use Alcohol 120% to open the ISO and then mount it and it should auto run through the virtual CD-ROM.  This is what I did though I am sure everyone's computer may run different.
